scripts.build: cd react-app; npm run build-prod; cd ../angular-app; npm run build; cd ../; cp -R static/* dist/
scripts.deploy-dev: firebase use default; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-dev
scripts.deploy-testing: firebase use default; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-testing
scripts.deploy-prod: firebase use production; firebase deploy --only hosting:tapit-app-production
